title: WTB T213-1 and T213-3 Dode Paskert
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: WTB T213-1 and T213-3 Dode Paskert
posts.post_content:
I'm interested in lower condition graded or raw 1910 T213-1 and 1919 T213-3 versions of Dode Paskert. If anyone has either of these cards available, please let me know.

Thanks,

Steve
